definition[0]: to put something in a safe place and lock the door, lid etc
example[0]: He locked his money away in the safe.
example[1]: I hope they lock him away for years.
definition[2]: to keep yourself separate from other people by staying in your room, office etc
definition[3]: to invest money in such a way that it is not available to be used
example[2]: He didn’t want to lock the money away in a ten-year Treasury note.
